dialogues.speaker: Ari
dialogues.message: LEON! OH MY GOD, THANK YOU!

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Anytime. I'm just glad you're safe. What's the deal with all these skeletons?

dialogues.speaker: Ari
dialogues.message: They just started showing up after that first tremor a couple of days ago. Now, the whole village is crawling with them.

dialogues.speaker: Ari
dialogues.message: It's gotta be some dark magic or something. Wizard Agnus might have answers.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Yeah, I was just heading there. Hopefully, he's got a plan.

dialogues.speaker: Ari
dialogues.message: Hold up, Leon! You saved my hide back there. Take this bow and arrow â€“ it'll be handy on your journey.

dialogues.speaker: Ari
dialogues.message: Don't stress about running low...if you've got gems, I'll trade 'em for arrows.

dialogues.speaker: Ari
dialogues.message: Plus, I might snag some new items, so swing by when you can. Now, go see Agnus!

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Thanks, Ari. I'll make sure to drop by. Take care of the shop!
